briefTitle: Impact of Obesity on the Efficacy of Endocrine Therapy With Aromatase Inhibitors
officialTitle: Impact of Obesity on the Efficacy of Endocrine Therapy With Aromatase Inhibitors in Postmenopausal Patients With Early Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* postmenopausal patients with breast cancer who have hormones receptor positive tumour as defined by the expression of oestrogen receptor (ER) and/or progesterone receptor (PR).
* patients with a tumour stage IB, IC, or II irrespective of nodal stage (\< 10 positive nodes)

Exclusion Criteria:

* premenopausal patients,
* ER/PR negative
